body: Ooops, I meant to say semen from the virgin-kuns, finding it out via commentator

Dear Hentai Gurus, I have a confession. I fapped once to a lovely hentai, but I forgot to save it. I still think of it to this day, I need help finding the holy numbers. It was about some girls on a cruise competing in a gameshow of sorts with a horde of 'virgin-kuns' watching. I don't remember much else other than at the end there was a casino deck with a dunking booth a bunny girl suits, and a orgy if i remember correctly. I remember the girls hardly knew about each competition or the punishment at the end, the first punishment being strapped to a machine and pumped with semen from the virgin-kuns, the girl finding out that it was semen from the commentator... The commentator was a dog, I think? Something wan? I need help. Thanks.
